review: We absolutely love this thing. So much so that we bought a second one for another room. The new iPhone remote app is fantastic.
author: Thor

review: i enjoy chromecast more, but so far so good
author: brent burk

review: arrived in record time . hooked it up in 5 minutes. however it has options for programming that are not free only a free trial period.. after a month they you are charged a monthly fee for many of its offers.. it does stream clear pictures and a variety of things to..not sure it was worth the cost knowing you still have to pay for features. thinking i have Prime would allow lots more features to be free. not the case. just saying it was easy to install but now knowing it will cost me more down the road might be a negative for me..thanks
author: Linda Kornilieff

review: The Amazon Fire Stick would be great if I could get sound; I have a surround sound system and I cannot get the sound to work.
author: Alice Morton

review: It works great! I have not had any problems with it at all!
author: Courtg

review: Arrived in a timely manner. Working well so far. I have plugged into a 60 inch TV and the picture is very clear. Easy to use and set up. Came pre-loaded with my Amazon information to make even easier to set up
author: Travis Kelly

review: I love it, so easy to install and set up I didn't even need my kids to help.  Rating it high for the product, not the shipping. Was supposed to be free two day shipping. Ordered on Thursday, arrived on Tuesday, I would usually get things on Saturday from a Thursday order, out even said that when I first looked at it.
author: Liz
